definitions.title: vb. Pi.
definitions.body: dub.; if correct, pass between (NH Pi. split, cut off, also=BH; Targum [[פְּסַג]] cut in two);—Imv. mpl. [[פִּסְּגוּ]] Ps 48:14 pass between her palaces; Gr Che [[פִּקְדוּ]]; Du conj. ‘possibly’ [[פִּסְעוּ]] step, cp.[NH [[פָּסַע]]] Aram. [[פְּסַע]] step, cf. [[[פָּשַׂע]]].
